001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
004import org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction;
005import org.bitcoinj.script.Script;
006
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.stream.Collectors;
009
010/**
011 * This represents the data in {@code signrawtransactionwithwallet}. Specifically
012 * inputs with UTXO hash and index and an empty scriptSig.
013 */
014public class RawTransactionSigningRequest {
015    private final List<RawInput> inputs;
016    private final List<TransactionOutputData> outputs;
017
018
019    public static RawTransactionSigningRequest of(List<RawInput> inputs, List<TransactionOutputData> outputs) {
020        return new RawTransactionSigningRequest(inputs, outputs);
021    }
022
023    public static RawTransactionSigningRequest ofTransaction(Transaction transaction) {
024        List<RawInput> inputs = transaction.getInputs().stream()
025                .map(i -> new RawInput(i.getOutpoint().hash(), (int) i.getOutpoint().getIndex(), i.getScriptSig()))
026                .collect(Collectors.toList());
027        List<TransactionOutputData> outputs = transaction.getOutputs().stream()
028                .map(TransactionOutputData::fromTxOutput)
029                .collect(Collectors.toList());
030        return RawTransactionSigningRequest.of(inputs, outputs);
031    }
032
033    public RawTransactionSigningRequest(List<RawInput> inputs, List<TransactionOutputData> outputs) {
034        this.inputs = inputs;
035        this.outputs = outputs;
036    }
037
038    public List<RawInput> inputs() {
039        return inputs;
040    }
041
042    public List<TransactionOutputData> outputs() {
043        return outputs;
044    }
045
046    public static class RawInput {
047        private final Sha256Hash txId;
048        private final int index;
049        private final Script scriptSig;
050
051        /**
052         * @param txId id
053         * @param index index
054         * @param scriptSig typically is empty script (at least in {@code signrawtransactionwithwallet} case
055         */
056        public RawInput(Sha256Hash txId, int index, Script scriptSig) {
057            this.txId = txId;
058            this.index = index;
059            this.scriptSig = scriptSig;
060        }
061
062        public Sha256Hash txId() {
063            return txId;
064        }
065
066        public int index() {
067            return index;
068        }
069
070        public Script scriptSig() {
071            return scriptSig;
072        }
073
074        public Utxo.Basic toUtxo() {
075            return Utxo.of(txId, index);
076        }
077    }
078}
